itunes:title: JUN 07, 2022 - TIGHT GUN CONTROL IN NIGERIA MAKES CHURCHES LESS SAFE
title: JUN 07, 2022 - TIGHT GUN CONTROL IN NIGERIA MAKES CHURCHES LESS SAFE
description:
A gunman kills at least 50 on Pentecost Sunday in a Catholic church in southwest Nigeria, despite having extremely tight gun-ownership regulations. Jack Posobiec’s tweet regarding the massacre receives serious backlash. Not only is Elon Musk threatening to back out of the Twitter Deal if accurate fake account data isn’t fully disclosed, but Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton is launching an investigation into the potential Twitter scandal. Jack Posobiec reports on the proposed Texas bill to ban minors from drag shows after Dallas authorities jump through loopholes to permit toddlers into ‘special performances’. New York Governor Kathy Hochul raises the age to purchase semi-automatic rifles to 21+ and calls to hold social media networks accountable for monitoring their platforms and for reporting hateful conduct.  



Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 


Save up to 65% on MyPillow products by going to MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO 


Go to patriotmobile.com/poso/ or call 972-PATRIOT to get free activation with offer code POSO
